reviewText: I just watched this. The band is not like Glen Miller's but are pretty good.  If you are a Glen Miller fan this is a must. Great selection of his music and done well. I really enjoyed this.
I bought this for my 90 year old mother-in-law.  She loved it from beginning to end.
Wonderful DVD. My mother has dementia but would remember all this nice music

I brought this DVD to the assisted living facility where my Mom lives.  The Activities Director puts it on for all the residents to watch in the Common Room.  They absolutely love it !!  Best Christmas gift for my Mom ever !
This is a great salute to Glen Miller.  Well staged, Well played
We enjoy Big Band Music and yes we would recommend this to others. Wished there were more Big Band DVD's
